column1: Bavette's Bar & Boeuf////This is the perfect spot for a special date
column2: an intimate dinner with family or friends
column3: or a just quick cocktail before a night on the town.  With a drink menu that includes sparkling cocktails (M Laurent is my fav!)
column4: old fashioneds (go with the hardy vs cognac)
column6: perfect wines (the Sangiovese pairs perfect with the short rib stroganoff)
column7: and an expansive selection of scotch
column10: they've got a little something for everyone!  If you can't choose
column11: their fantastic bartenders can undoubtedly steer you in the right direction!
